about.title: About Me
about.section1: I'm a full-stack software developer and Systems Analysis and Development student at the University of Passo Fundo (UPF), based in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil. I have built highly dynamic web applications, back-end systems, observability and infrastructure solutions, and command line tools.
about.section2: I'm always finding out new tech to experiment with, as I enjoy using it as a learning and organization resource. Outside of that, I have many other personal interests, such as film, music, and photography. Feel free to explore my work and reach out – I'm open to challenges and opportunities to collaborate.
